DASHBOARD.HIDEEMPTYACCOUNTS: Vige Zita risina Zita Empty Accounts

SEND.LABEL: Tora
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Isa boka rekero yekero ino kuti uiise mubhuku rekero rako
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: Input yakavharwa. Iwe uchada kuzarura mazwi aya kuti uushandise.
SEND.ALERTFEECHANGECONTENT: Iko chaiyo yekutengesa mari yakareba kupfuura yakatarisirwa. Ndapota chengetedza mitsva itsva:

STAKING.STAKINGTITLE: Chikwata chechikwata iye zvino chiri kupinza
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: Dambudziko rekuti iwe unofanirwa kuita kuti staking iite staking = 1 mune yako metrix.conf file.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINFO: Mari yechikwama chako ikozvino chakavharwa kuti chigadzike.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: Iwe unogona kutanga kutengesa nekuzarura chikwama chako chekugadzira

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Hapana chinobuda kunze kweMasternode chakawanikwa. Kuti umhanye yemasternode yemuno tumira chaiyo 2,5,25,50 kana zana emamiriyoni emadhora kero yako yeMasternode uye umirire 15 zvichisimbisa.

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Iwe unogona kutumira mameseji neateri dzako kuti uzviratidze kuti iwe pachako. Ngwarira kuti usasaina chero chinhu chisina kujeka, sezvo kupesana kwepishingwa kunogona kuedza kukunyengedza kuti usayine unhu hwako pamusoro pavo. Chengetesa zvizere-zvinyorwa zvitsanangudzo zvaunobvumirana nazvo.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Pinda kero yekunyora, mharidzo (chengetedza iwe kukopa mitsara yemagetsi, nzvimbo, mabhii, nezvimwe chaizvo) uye chinyoreso chiri pasi kuti uoneke shoko. Ngwarira kuti urege kuverenga zvakanyanya muchitinha kupfuura izvo zviri mumharidzo yakasayirwa pachako, kuti usanyengedzwa nemunhu-mu-ari-pakati kurwisa.

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Kugamuchirwa kuMetrix Core RPC console. Tora rubatsiro rwekupfupisa kwemirairo iripo.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: CHENYENZISO: Vashanduri vave vachishanda, vachiudza vashandisi kuti vape mairairo pano, vachibira chikwama chavo mukati. Usashandise iyi console usinganyatsonzwisisi ramification yemurairo.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Iyi mirairo yekugadzirisa haigoni kuendeswa apo Metrix Core iri kumhanya kunze
REPAIR.INFO: Iko mabhatani ari pasi apa anotanga kugovera Metrix Core nemasarudza-mutsara wemirairo yekugadzirisa chikwereti, kugadzirisa nyaya neefodhi ye block block kana kusipo / kusagadzikana kwekutengesa.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Kuedza kuwana mahwindo ega ega kubva pachikwama chakaipa.dat.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Recan the blockchain yekushayikwa kwechikwama chechikwata.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Dzorera zvekutengesa kubva blockchain (chengetedza meta-data, p.
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Dzorera zvekutengesa kubva ku blockchain (geda meta-data)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Upgrade wallet kusvika purogiramu yepamusoro pakutanga. (Cherechedzai: ichi hachizidzo chechikwata chairo!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Dzoka blockchain index kubva pane ikozvino blk000 ?? dat dat files.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Dhawunirodha Metrix blockchain mafaira kubva kune metrixcoin.com uye bootstrap yako yekuisa. Zvichienderana netiweki yako yekubatanidza izvi zvinogona kutora maminetsi gumi kune maawa mashoma
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Delete yako yemuno blockchain mafaera uye kutangazve kubva genesis block.
REPAIR.RESTARTCOREINFO: Kutangazve Metrix Core kana yave kutoshanda kana kutanga Metrix Core kana isiri kuita.
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREINFO: Delete yako yemunharaunda Metrix Core uye istake zvakare kubva kune Metrix maseva.

EXPLORER.TITLE: Block Explorer
EXPLORER.SEARCHPLACEHOLDER: Tsvaga mutengesi, chivharo kana kuti hash
EXPLORER.SEARCHNORESULTS: Haikwanise kuwana bhokisi kana kutengesa kwakafanana nekutsvaga kwako

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Shandisa sega proxy SOCKS5 kusvika kune vezera kuburikidza neTor yakavanzwa mazano
NETWORK.RESTARTREQUIRED: A Client anotanga kudiwa inobvumira chero shanduko kune izvi.
NETWORK.SYNCINTERVAL: Kakawanda sei Kukwirira kubvunza iyo daemon (Default: 10 Masekondi)

WINDOW.MINIMIZETOTRAY: Deredza zvishoma kune tereyti panzvimbo yebharaki

STATUS.UNLOCKEDSTAKING: Chikwama chechikwata chakavharwa kuti chigadzike chete
STATUS.STAKING: Chikwata chechikwata iye zvino chiri kupinza

PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: Chimwe chiitiko chinowanika kuna Metrix Core. Ungada kuisa ikozvino here?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Chimwe chiitiko chinowanikwa kune Altitude. Ungada kuitora ikozvino here?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: Kubatana kwave kwakarasikirwa naMetrix Core. Iwe unogona kumira chikwama kana kutanga mukati Metrix Core.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Chero zvipi zvekare zvawakachengetedza zvepahomwe yako faira inofanira kuchinjwa neyo ichangobva kugadzirwa, yakavharwa chikwama chikwama. Nezvikonzero zvekuchengeteka, zvipembenene zvekare zveiyo asina kuvharwa faira refurheni zvichange zvisina zvazvinobatsira pakarepo paunotanga kushandisa svondo itsva, yakavharidzirwa.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Paive paine dambudziko neMetrix Core iyo yaakaita kuti ipere. Inokurudzirwa kutarisa yako debug.log faira yezvinyorwa.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: Wako metrix.conf ane musternode yakashata yakasangana iyo ichaita kuti Metrix Core abve pakarepo. Ndapota chengeta iyi faira.
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: Paive paine dambudziko bootstrging Metrix Core. Inokurudzirwa kutarisa yako yeAltitude log faira yezvinetso.
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDINFO: Paive nekutanga Metrix Core. Inokurudzirwa kutarisa yako yeAltitude log faira yezvinetso.
PROMPT.CLIENTUNKNOWNERRORINFO: Paive nedambudziko rekutaurirana neMetrix Core. Inokurudzirwa kutarisa yako debug.log faira yezvinyorwa.
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORCONTENT: Iwe une chokwadi here kuti unoda kunyoresa Gavhuna wako? Iwe hauchakwanise kuvhota pane cheni hutongi.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Address Book
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: Idzi ndidzo kero yako yakachengetedzwa yeLinda pakutumira zvikwereti. Nguva dzose chengeta mari uye kugamuchira kero kare usati watumira mari
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: Iyi ndiyo yero yako yakachengetedzwa yeLinda yekugamuchira mari.

MAINCHAINCHECK.ALERT: Yambiro! Iwe hausi pane ketani yakakosha maererano neMetrix Explorer. Zvinokurudzirwa zvikuru kudzorerazve kana kubatanidzira zvekare blockchain yako kuti urege kurasikirwa nechero mari.

NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Haikwanisi kutarisa kuti zvigadziridzwe. Tarisa yako network.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Mari yaunotumira inodarika chikamu chako chakasarudzwa
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Kukwana kusakwana kwakasarudzwa kuti kupedze mutengesi uyu
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: Nzira isina kuzivikanwa yakavapo. Iwe unogona kunge uchida kutangazve chikwama chako uye edza zvakare. Kana matambudziko achienderera mberi tapota taura rubatsiro.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: Zvose zvinodiwa zvinoda zvishoma 1 kuvimbiswa vasati vashandisa.
NOTIFICATIONS.FAILEDTOWRITECONFIG: Paive paine dambudziko rekunyorera kune yako metrix.conf faira. Tarisa iyo faira iripo uye kuti Altitude ine kunyorera mvumo.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOPUBLICUP: Hapana IP IP kero yakawanikwa. Tarisa yako internet yekubatanidza uye tanga zvakare Altitude.
NOTIFICATIONS.REPORTINGISSUE: Kuwana ruzivo rwekutsvaga... Ruzivo urwu ruchateedzerwa kune yako clipboard.

GOVERNANCE.NOTGOVERNORDETAIL: Magavhuna ane basa revavhoti pamwedzi mabhajeti uye blockchain shanduko. Unogona kuve Gavhuna nekuvhara chibvumirano chakakodzera muchibvumirano cheKutonga.
GOVERNANCE.CONFIRMENROLL: Iwe wave kuda kunyoresa seGavhuna. Izvi zvinotumira kutengeserana nechinodikanwa chakabvumirana muchibvumirano chekutonga. Iwe unogona kusunungura chero nguva.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL1: Magavhuna ane basa revavhoti pamwedzi mabhajeti uye blockchain shanduko.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL2: Kuti ugare Gavhuna iwe unofanirwa kutora chikamu mukuvhota kamwe chete pamazuva makumi matatu.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL3: Kana pasina chinhu chekuvhota pane ipapo iwe unogona kuenda pamurume kunyoresa kwako nekutumira anoshanda ping.

BUDGET.TITLE: Zvirongwa zveBhajeti
BUDGET.MINIMUMGOVERNORS: Mabhajeti haakwanise kupfuudzwa kudzamara hushoma nhamba yemagavhuna aripo pacheni.

CREATEPROPOSAL.TITLE: Gadzira Chirevo
CREATEPROPOSAL.DESCRIPTION: Pazasi unogona kugadzira bhajeti chikumbiro uye kuendesa kune network kune yekuvhota pamberi inotevera bhajeti kugadzirisa.
CREATEPROPOSAL.PROPOSALADDRESS: Kero Yekubhadhara (Iwe unofanirwa kuve neyako kero)

NOTIFICATIONS.INCOMPLETEFORM: Hausati wazadza mumunda wese unodiwa nenzira kwayo
NOTIFICATIONS.INVALIDPROPOSALDURATION: Kurudziro durations inofanira kunge iri pakati pegumi nemwedzi gumi nemaviri
NOTIFICATIONS.ENROLLEDGOVERNOR: Kunyoresa kwako kunenge kwapera kana chiitiko chako chasimbiswa
NOTIFICATIONS.VOTEDONPROPOSAL: Vhoti yako ichaverengerwa kana iko kusimbiswa kusimbiswa.
NOTIFICATIONS.PINGEDGOVERNOR: Ping akatumirwa zvinobudirira. Gavhuna wako anozogadziridzwa kana iko kutengiswa kwatsigirwa
NOTIFICATIONS.UNENROLLEDGOVERNOR: Transaction yakatumirwa. Gavhuna wako anenge asina kunyoreswa kana chiitiko chacho chagadziriswa
NOTIFICATIONS.GOVERNORNOTMATURE: Gavhuna wako haasati akura zvakakwana kuti aite chiito ichi zvakadaro

HOME.INFOLINE1: Paunenge uchinge uine BTC dhipoziti kero, chero BTC inotumirwa kukero iyoyo inozobva yatsinhaniswa neMRX mune yako yakasarudzwa MRX kero.
HOME.INFOLINE2-1: Shanduko dzinowanzojekesa mukati meawa zvichienderana neBitcoin block nguva
HOME.INFOLINE2-2: Nekushandisa sevhisi iyi, unobvuma kuti HAUGARI munyika dzakanyorwa
HOME.INFOLINE3: Kamwe kana yako BTC dhipoziti yabvisa iwe unozogamuchira yako MRX mune yako yakasarudzwa kero.

NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADYHAVEADDRESS: Une kero yeBTC inosangana neiyi Metrix kero
